info.title: Trébol API (Draft)
info.description: A collection of resources that the Trébol backend exposes to interact with.

get.description: GET actions that the current session is authorized to do using the products API.

options.summary: Preflight check for products API operation accesses
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET actions that the current session is authorized to do using the sales API.

options.summary: Preflight check for sales API operation accesses
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET actions that the current session is authorized to do using the users API.

options.summary: Preflight check for users API operation accesses
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET actions that the current session is authorized to do using the customers API.

options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET actions that the current session is authorized to do using the salespeople API.

options.summary: Preflight check for salespeople API operation accesses
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

/data/customers.description: Operations to fetch, create, edit and remove customers and their metadata.

get.description: GET a paged collection of customers.

post.description: POST a new customer entity and save it to the data store

options.summary: Preflight check for non-specific customer API
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

/data/people.description:
Operations to fetch people data. 
Editing operations cannot be done through this resource.

get.description: GET a paged collection of people.

options.summary: Preflight check for people API
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

/data/products.description: Operations to fetch, create, edit and remove products and their metadata.

get.description: GET a paged collection of products.

post.description: POST a new product entity and save it to the data store

options.summary: Preflight check for non-specific product API
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET a paged collection of sales.

post.description: POST a new sell entity and save it to the data store.

/data/user_roles.description: Operations to fetch, create, edit and remove user roles and their metadata.

/public/about.description: Public resource for general information about the company behind the shop.

200.description: Normal response. Sends an object containing information about the shop.

get.description: GET general information regarding the company behind the shop.

options.summary: Preflight check for shop information
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET the main (bigger) categories where to browse the products available for sale at the shop.

options.summary: Preflight check for product categories
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

parameters.name: method
parameters.description: The payment method requested by the user.

200.description: Normal response. The transaction was acknowledged and initiated. Details to redirect towards the payment page are included.

post.description: POST cart details to initiate a virtual transaction in the shop.

options.summary: Preflight check for payment request
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

303.description:
Normal, empty response, sent when the transaction was approved. Redirects the user.

'Location' response header should be included with a URL to the result page.

post.description: POST response from the payment method to confirm the transaction end result.

options.summary: Preflight check for payment confirmation
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET the customer identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

put.description: PUT changes to the customer identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

delete.description: DELETE a customer with the id parameter, from the data store.

options.summary: Preflight check for specific-customer API endpoint
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

parameters.name: idNumber
parameters.description: The unique ID card number of the customer.

get.description: GET the image identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

put.description: PUT changes to the image identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

delete.description: DELETE an image with the id parameter, from the data store.

options.summary: Preflight check for specific-image API endpoint
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET complete public information about a transaction, matched by its ID, code, or whatever unique property is used to identify it.

options.summary: Preflight check for specific transaction receipt
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET the user identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

put.description: PUT changes to the user identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

delete.description: DELETE a user with the id parameter, from the data store.

options.summary: Preflight check for specific-user API endpoint
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

post.description: POST a new salesperson entity and save it to the data store.

options.summary: Preflight check for non-specific salesperson API
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET the salesperson identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

put.description: PUT changes to the salesperson identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

delete.description: DELETE a salesperson with the id parameter, from the data store.

options.summary: Preflight check for specific-salesperson API endpoint
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

parameters.name: idNumber
parameters.description: The unique ID card number of the salesperson.

get.description: GET the sell identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

put.description: PUT changes to the sell identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

delete.description: DELETE a sell with the id parameter, from the data store.

options.summary: Preflight check for specific-sell API endpoint
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

parameters.name: buyOrder
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the sell.

get.description: GET the product identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

put.description: PUT changes to the product identified by a provided id parameter in the route path.

delete.description: DELETE a product with the id parameter, from the data store.

options.summary: Preflight check for specific-product API
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: A unique code for a Product.

/data/product_categories.description: Operations to fetch, create, edit and remove product categories and their metadata.

get.description: GET every product category available without a parent set.

post.description: POST a new product category entity and save it to the data store.

options.summary: Preflight check for root product categories API
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET every category that is a child of the one identified by the provided code.

put.description: PUT changes to the product category identified by a provided code parameter in the route path.

delete.description: DELETE a product category with the code parameter, from the data store.

options.summary: Preflight check for children product categories API
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

parameters.name: parentCode
parameters.description: Unique identifier of a parent product category.

get.description: GET all products currently on sale at the shop. May accept sorting, ordering, paging and filtering conditions in query parameters.

options.summary: Preflight check for available products
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET the current user's stored profile information

put.description: PUT changes into the current user's profile information.

options.summary: Preflight check for user profile information
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

200.description: Normal response; a guest token was generated. It is included in the response headers and body.

403.description: Erroneous, empty response to improper use; the user was already logged in or using a valid guest token.

post.description: POST personal information to generate a token for a temporary guest session.

options.summary: Preflight check for guest session opener
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

200.description: Normal response; the credentials are correct, and an authorization token was generated. It is included in the response headers and body.

403.description: Erroneous, empty response, sent when the credentials are rejected.

post.description: POST credentials to authenticate, generate an authorization token and start a new session.

options.summary: Preflight check for session opener
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

200.description: Normal, empty response; sent when the registration is succesful and the user account is created. The user should proceed log in with the same input credentials.

post.description: POST details for a new user account, including its profile information.

options.summary: Preflight check for account registrar
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET the API resource paths that the current session is authorized to use.

options.summary: Preflight check for API resource accesses
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET every billing type available.

options.summary: Preflight check for billing types API
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

get.description: GET complete public information about a specific product.

options.summary: Preflight check for specific product
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

/public/categories/{parentId}.summary: Product subcategories within specific main category

get.summary: Find and list product subcategories within specific main category
get.description: GET the subcategories found within the provided main category ID.

options.summary: Preflight check for product subcategories
options.description: Fetch OPTIONS for communicating with this resource.

LoginCredentials.title: Root Type for LoginCredentials
LoginCredentials.description: Data sent by an user to authenticate themselves.

name.description: The full name of the individual.

phone2.description: A second phone number (without pluses or parentheses)

idNumber.description: The national identification number as issued by the individual's birth country government.

UserRegistration.title: Root Type for UserRegistration
UserRegistration.description: Credentials and personal information for a new user account.

CartDetail.title: Root Type for CartDetail
CartDetail.description: Representation of data about a single product within a shopping cart.

units.description: The amount, or quantity of the related product.

Image.title: Root Type for Image
Image.description: A reference to an image that can be found following a given URL.

filename.description: The file name of the image.

url.description: The URL to find the image at.

code.description: Unique identifier of the image. Allows URL-compatible characters only.

PaymentRedirection.title: Root Type for PaymentRedirection
PaymentRedirection.description: Metadata used to redirect the user towards a payment method.

url.description: The url to access the payment service and undergo the transaction process.

token.description: A secret code that the external payment service will use to identify the transaction.

Product.title: Root Type for product
Product.description: A physical item or a service that the shop offers to the public.

name.description: The given name of the product.

barcode.description: A unique identifier for the product. Normally issued by an external ERP service.

price.description: The price of the product, valued by the store's local currency.

images.description: A list of images that illustrate this product.

code.description: A unique identifier for the product. Read-only after creation.

category.description: The category the product is associated to.

description.description: A summary of the product qualities

buyOrder.description: The unique identifier for the transaction.

amount.description: The total value paid in the receipt.

status.description: The current status of the transaction.

date.description: The hour and date that the transaction was confirmed.

details.description: A list that provides full information about the acquired products or services.

ReceiptDetail.title: Root Type for CartDetail
ReceiptDetail.description: Part of a receipt's contents, related to a given Product.

units.description: The amount or quantity of the given product.

example.name: example shop owner details
example.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Suspendisse arcu eros, semper id interdum ut, molestie ut ex. Nulla lobortis viverra tempor.

Customer.title: Root Type for Customer
Customer.description: Store customers. They directly relate to Person's in a one-to-one relationship.

Salesperson.title: Root Type for Salesperson
Salesperson.description: Store vendors/workers. Like Customers, they relate to Person's in a one-to-one relationship they could, but should not collide.

SellDetail.title: Root Type for SellDetail
SellDetail.description: Representation of data about a single product within a single sell.

product.description: The product related to this detail.

units.description: The amount of products in this detail.

Sell.title: Root Type for Sell
Sell.description: A transaction already requested or yet to be requested.

details.description: A list that provides full information about the acquired products or services.

billingType.description: The name of the chosen method for generating a bill of the sell.

date.description: (UTC) The date and time that the transaction was acknowledged.

paymentType.description: The selected method for payment for this transaction.

salesperson.description: The employee that authorized the sell.

billingCompany.description: The company, if any, that will pay the bill.

netValue.description: The total value derived from the products included at the moment of transaction.

status.description: The step that the transaction is in.

customer.description: The customer that initiated the transaction.

name.description: A unique name that the user logs in with.

role.description: The name of the role this user has.

UserRole.title: Root Type for UserRole
UserRole.description: A user role holds permissions to consume certain APIs.

example.name: example role
example.description: this role has access to read most data, excepting users

AuthorizedAccess.title: Root Type for AuthorizedAcess
AuthorizedAccess.description: A generic container of API resource paths or actions on a specific resource, for which access is granted

routes.description: A list of authorized routes to consume.

permissions.description: A list of authorized actions for a specific route.

ProductCategory.title: Root Type for ProductFamily
ProductCategory.description: A Product group/category. Each one can be divided into smaller subsets (ProductType).

name.description: The name displayed for the category.

parent.description: A category existing one level above the current.

code.description: A unique identifier for the category.

totalCount.description: The total amount of items matched under the same search criteria used to fetch the current page.

pageSize.description: The amount of items requested and (presumably) contained in the page.

secondLine.description: Further information of the address, such as apartment or office.

city.description: The name of the city where the address is located.

municipality.description: The province where the address is located.

notes.description: Extra bits of information or comments. Mostly helpful to Shippers.

BillingCompany.title: Root Type for BillingCompany
BillingCompany.description: A company or similar organization, enabled to pay taxes.

idNumber.description: The national identification number for the company.

SellStatus.title: Root Type for SellStatus
SellStatus.description: Representation of a step in the checkout process.

code.description: Unique identifier. Negative values represent error states, positive values represent steps in the checkout process.

PaymentType.title: Root Type for PaymentType
PaymentType.description: Designates the method that the customer used to pay their bill.

name.description: The name given to this payment type.

BillingType.title: Root Type for ProductType
BillingType.description: Dictates taxes to be applied to a given Sell.

name.description: The name given to this billing type.

PaginatedCollection.description: Normal response for most "/data" methods; sends items in an array, along with pagination metadata.

Forbidden.description: Erroneous, empty response for requests not meeting security requirements. Most likely, it does not have authorization to access specific privileged resource(s), or does not include any form of authentication while requesting some privileged resource(s).

UnknownError.description: Erroneous response sent when the API server is having a general malfunction or is unavailable.

AuthorizedAccessToSingleRoute.description: Normal response. Sends an AuthorizedAccess object with an array of available and permitted actions.

AuthorizedAccessToRoutes.description: Normal response. Sends an array of API routes available for use from a parent path.

NotFound.description: Non-erroneous, empty response which indicates that no data matched the provided criteria.

Empty.description: Normal response which indicates everything went right (after successfully altering data, for example) and that there's no additional information to be included.

AllowMethodPOST.description: Normal, empty response to some OPTIONS requests. Should include CORS headers and indicate that only the POST method is allowed.

AllowMethodGET.description: Normal, empty response to some OPTIONS requests. Should include CORS headers and indicate that only the GET method is allowed.

AllowMethodGET-POST.description: Normal, empty response to some OPTIONS requests. Should include CORS headers and indicate that only the GET and POST methods are allowed.

AllowAllMethods.description: Normal, empty response to some OPTIONS requests. Should include CORS headers and indicate that the methods GET, POST PUT and DELETE are allowed.

AllowMethodGET-PUT.description: Normal, empty response to some OPTIONS requests. Should include CORS headers and indicate that only the GET and PUT methods are allowed.

AllowMethodGET-PUT-DELETE.description: Normal, empty response to some OPTIONS requests. Should include CORS headers and indicate that only the GET, PUT and DELETE methods are allowed.

BadRequestBody.description: Erroneous response, sent when the request does not meet certain expectations. This probably because required properties were not included in the request body, or because certain data constraints (duplicate code numbers, for example) were not met.

SingleProduct.description: Normal response, sends an object representation of an individual product.

SingleSell.description: Normal response, sends an object representation of an individual sell.

SingleReceipt.description: Normal response, sends an object representation of an individual transaction receipt.

MultipleProductCategories.description: Normal response, sends an array of product categories.

MultipleUserRoles.description: Normal response, sends an array of user roles.

SingleImage.description: Normal response, sends an object representation of an individual image.

SingleCustomer.description: Normal response, sends an object representation of an individual customer.

SingleSalesperson.description: Normal response, sends an object representation of an individual salesperson.

SingleUser.description: Normal response, sends an object representation of an individual user.

SinglePerson.description: Normal response, sends an object representation of an individual person.

MultipleBillingTypes.description: Normal response, sends an array of user roles.

AuthorizedRequest.description: Requests including a Bearer token in their Authorization header.
